audiobook.description:
Author(s): Maggie Miller Narrator(s): Vivienne Leheny, Laura Jennings, Allyson Voller, Cindy Kay, Erin Bateman, Nancy Wu, Sara Morsey, Suzie Althens

Second chances do exist.


Five former sorority sisters, all in their 50's, undertake the adventure of a lifetime when a mysterious invite reunites them at an exclusive resort set on a private island.


And what adventures they've had so far at Mother's! With a new section of the resort open and operating, numerous new guests, and two weddings about to take place, the women have their hands full.


Can they juggle everything that's going on in their lives and business and still produce two amazing weddings?


Walk down the aisle with them on Compass Key and find out.

<p>Second chances do exist.</p><p><br></p><p>Five former sorority sisters, all in their 50's, undertake the adventure of a lifetime when a mysterious invite reunites them at an exclusive resort set on a private island.</p><p><br></p><p>And what adventures they've had so far at Mother's! With a new section of the resort open and operating, numerous new guests, and two weddings about to take place, the women have their hands full.</p><p><br></p><p>Can they juggle everything that's going on in their lives and business and still produce two amazing weddings?</p><p><br></p><p>Walk down the aisle with them on Compass Key and find out.</p>
audiobook.name: The Wedding: Compass Key, Book 7
